name: TheHorseTamer
0:
”Alexa, start the horse tamer”
”Alexa, open the horse tamer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the horse tamer
des:
Play an interactive adventure! Horse-themed story with sound effects and prompts. For every horse fan in your life, enjoy this short story where they can choose the names of the characters!
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
